text.title: Staples Brand Engagement Network -- Back to School Moms
text.more: OwnerIQ, through its data partners, is able to see browsing activity across over 1000 brands and 7000 product types.
text.intro: This visual represents the network of interacted brands from the Staples back to school mom audience

legend.edgeLabel: The relative thickness of the line represents the overlap or correlation between browsed brands
legend.colorLabel: Colors represent clustered constellations or mini networks of co-engaged brands
legend.nodeLabel: Brand (size of the circle/node represents the relative shopping activity)
